args.name: assetId
args.desc: The asset to be held in escrow

args.name: quantity
args.desc: The quantity of the asset to transfer

args.name: paymentAmount
args.desc: The amount the boss has to pay

args.name: worker
args.desc: The worker who will receive the asset if the condition is met

methods.name: setConditionMet
methods.desc:
Sets the condition to true, allowing funds release, and sends a message to the worker
This can be called by the boss upon confirmation that work is done or the asset has been delivered.


The address of the worker to confirm identity and send a message

methods.name: optInToAsset
methods.desc:
Opt the contract address into the asset being held in escrow.
This allows the contract to hold the asset securely.

args.name: mbrTxn
args.desc: The payment transaction that covers the Minimum Balance Requirement (MBR) for opting into the asset.

methods.name: releaseFunds
methods.desc: Transfer funds from escrow to worker if the condition is met

args.name: workerPaymentTxn
args.desc: The payment transaction from the boss to the contract

methods.name: deleteEscrow
methods.desc:
Method to cancel the escrow and delete the application
Returns any remaining funds or assets to the boss

sourceInfo.errorMessage: The requested action is not implemented in this contract. Are you using the correct OnComplete? Did you set your app ID?
argument 0 (worker) for createApplication must be a address
argument 0 (mbrTxn) for optInToAsset must be a pay transaction
argument 0 (workerPaymentTxn) for releaseFunds must be a pay transaction
this contract does not implement the given ABI method for create NoOp
